name: 鍾建屏
objective:
本課程聚焦多國籍公司財務管理，介紹基礎的國際財務管理理論概念，以及相關財務管理的重要課題。授課內容由基礎的國際金融環境切入，循序漸進討論外匯市場與外匯理論、多國籍企業的財務管理，以及匯率風險管理等主題，同時結合豐富的理論和時事議題探討，希望使修習本課程的學生置身多國籍企業財務經理人的角色，學習運籌帷幄，制定妥善的國際財務管理決策。
The course emphasizes broad concepts and practices, and provides a clear conceptual framework for analyzing key financial decisions in multinational firms. This course intends to introduce theories and concepts about international financial environment, foreign exchange market, multinational financial management, and risk management of exchange rate. Through abundant theories and practical materials, students will understand how to play the role of multinational financial manager, and how to make appropriate decisions of multinational financial management. Topics include international financial markets; foreign exchange rate; the relationships among interest rates, inflation, and foreign exchange rates; management of foreign exchange risk; motives for direct foreign investment; multinational capital budgeting; country risk analysis; capital structure decision; and international cash management.
